thread.title: Big Sean Drops "I Decided" Trailer & Announces Pop-Up Shops
thread.title_full: Big Sean Drops "I Decided" Trailer & Announces Pop-Up Shops

author: Danielle Harling
title: Big Sean Drops "I Decided" Trailer & Announces Pop-Up Shops
text:
Big Sean Drops "I Decided" Trailer & Announces Pop-Up Shops February 2, 2017 | 10:11 AM 1 
Detroit rapper Big Sean is continuing to build hype for his impending album, I Decided , with the release of a new trailer. 
Although brief, the 30-second teaser features music from “Halfway Off The Balcony” and “Voices In My Head,” two tracks that are set to appear on the album that’s coming out Friday (February 3). 
In the stylish visual (see above), which was directed by Canadian filmmaker Andy Hines, Big Sean can be seen standing in the middle of a desolate street as it floods. We shot this less than a week ago. 
— Andy Hines (@andyhinestv) February 2, 2017 
In addition to today’s video teaser, Sean Don hit fans with another dose of good news. The Motor City rapper will launch four separate pop-up shops to celebrate the release of his fourth studio album. 
Pop-up shop locations include Detroit, New York, Los Angeles, and Toronto. 
“I’m too excited to be Dropping new merchandise this weekend for y’all exclusively at the I Decided pop-up shop. Detroit, New York, LA & Toronto. 4 locations each one starts Friday and ends Sunday,” Big Sean wrote in the caption to a photo of the flyer for the pop-up shops. A photo posted by BIGSEAN (@bigsean) on Feb 1, 2017 at 7:56am PST 
With a new album and nationwide pop-up shops on the way, Big Sean has clearly come a long way since his Shakespearean days.
